How can I use the Verus command-line interface to list all available currencies?
To list all available currencies using the Verus command-line interface, simply run the command `verus listcurrencies true`. This will display a list of all available currencies on the Verus network.

Examples:
> verus listcurrencies true
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listcurrencies", "params": [true] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
